metadata.title: CVE-2017-13135 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A NULL Pointer Dereference exists in VideoLAN x265, as used in libbpg 0.9.7and other products, because the CUData::initialize function incommon/cudata.cpp mishandles memory-allocation failure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13135` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libx265-79 - 1.9-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
x265 - 1.9-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: x265 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9-3ubuntu0.1~esm1').
